forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: progress on 'plate of submision'

comments.text: currently, it is in it's 3rd stage although since i have returned, i've decided to put it on hold for now.
i do have plans for how it will look in it's 4th stage but my body isn't ready. jokes asside though, i'll be like a gremlin wearing royal knight armor.
it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.
